stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.


Answer (a), (b), and (c).

Briefly describe the concept of Manifest Destiny.

Briefly explain ONE specific historical reason that the concept of Manifest Destiny emerged in the 1840s.

Briefly describe ONE specific historical similarity or difference between the concept of Manifest Destiny in the 1840s and the ideas that motivated European colonists to migrate to North America in the 1600s.
